citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:55 pm to 1:25 pm
on March 10, 2022. During that time, the inspector waited at the facility, knocked on doors, called phone number on file
leaving a message, and left a leave behind flyer.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:55 pm to 1:25 pm 
on March 10, 2022. During that time, the inspector waited at the facility, knocked on doors, called phone number on file 
leaving a message, and left a leave behind flyer. 
 
 
 
End Section
